utter_faq/ask_prices.text: The standard price for a doctor's appointment is 40â‚¬. Prices change for the following two groups: 1. Students --> 20â‚¬ 2. Unemployed people --> 10â‚¬

utter_faq/ask_phone_number.text: You can reach our clinic by calling this number: +30 2102102102

utter_faq/tell_me_about_you.text: I am DocBot. I am designed to assist you in various tasks: 1. I can help you book a doctor's appointment 2. I can give you information about our clinic 3. I can give you some interesting facts about various health topics

utter_faq/ask_services.text: DocBot offers 3 main services. With Docbot you can: 1. Book a doctor's appointment 2. Get informed about three health topics (heart/ folic acid/ falling) 3. Calculate and find your BMI
